eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Mobile, AL; at 09:30 AM ON DEC 17, 2025 Effective until 03:30 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Mobile Co Alert: THIS IS A TEST OF THE MOBILE COUNTY EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM.

To ensure others receive alerts, have them text "MOBILEALERT" to 226787
